update zj_tz_life_cycle set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=CHAR}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=DATE}, register_person = #{registerPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_id = #{statusId,jdbcType=CHAR}, status_name = #{statusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=CHAR}, apih5_flow_status = #{apih5FlowStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, opinion_field1 = #{opinionField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opinion_field2 = #{opinionField2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opinion_field3 = #{opinionField3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opinion_field4 = #{opinionField4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opinion_field5 = #{opinionField5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opinion_field6 = #{opinionField6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opinion_field7 = #{opinionField7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opinion_field8 = #{opinionField8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opinion_field9 = #{opinionField9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opinion_field10 = #{opinionField10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remind_flag = #{remindFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where life_cycle_id = #{lifeCycleId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.delete:
update zj_tz_life_cycle set del_flag = '1', modify_time=#{param2.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user=#{param2.modifyUser}, modify_user_name=#{param2.modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and life_cycle_id in
#{model.lifeCycleId}
mapper.select: ( SELECT '1' AS flag, remind_time AS remindTime, real_name AS realName, mobile, MAX(SENDTIME) AS sendTime, t3.life_cycle_id, t3.remind_flag, user_id AS userId FROM tw_hz_worklist t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t2.user_key = t1.AUTH_ID AND t2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN zj_tz_life_cycle t3 ON t3.work_id = t1.WORKID AND t3.del_flag = '0' WHERE t1.FLOWID IN ( 'zjTzLifeCycle', 'zjTzLifeCycle3' ) GROUP BY mobile ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '2' AS flag, remind_time AS remindTime, real_name AS realName, mobile, MAX(SENDTIME) AS sendTime, t3.life_cycle__change_id AS life_cycle_id, t3.remind_flag, user_id AS userId FROM tw_hz_worklist t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t2.user_key = t1.AUTH_ID AND t2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN zj_tz_life_cycle_change t3 ON t3.work_id = t1.WORKID AND t3.del_flag = '0' WHERE t1.FLOWID IN ( 'zjTzLifeCycleChange', 'zjTzLifeCycleChange3' ) GROUP BY mobile ) ORDER BY SENDTIME DESC
